concept.title: Why Use Acme Eye?
concept.shortdesc: This guide: Building Proposals with Acme Eye provides steps on how to build proposals with Acme Eye, a proposal automation tool. It is for Acme associates who work on proposals. It includes reviewing prerequisites, such as browser, Mac OS, Microsoft Office, and Windows, installing browser setup script and logging in, creating a project, completing screens, and building your documents. Acme Eye enables you to save time and increase sales. Preparing proposals is a time-consuming task. Using Acme Eye enables you to save 40% of your time because it automates repetitive tasks. It allows you to spend more time with customers and less time in the office. Thus, it boosts your odds of closing deals and bringing in more revenue.

conbody.p: Acme Eye is a Web-based tool that is easy to use. It enables you to create proposals and other client-focused documents that follow a common structure. You make selections that reflect the customerâ€™s needs. The software uses those selections to create a client-centric, persuasive document in Microsoft Word.

This guide includes the following sections.
Step 1: Reviewing Prerequisites
Step 2: Installing Browser Setup Script & Logging in
Step 3: Creating a Project
Step 4: Completing Data Screens
Step 5: Completing Selection Screens
Step 6: Building your Document
Sections 1 through 6 define the steps to build a proposal with Acme Eye.
